abstract: Sauvignon blanc from Burgundy? Isn't Burgundy chardonnay country, at least as far as its white wines are concerned? Yes, mostly it is. But there are a few exceptions, and one is Saint-Bris, part of a small cluster of wine-making villages that produce wines similar to those of Sancerre and its satellites.
